Text: **SnApp needs to identify each tomcat to grant data consistency in case of a server restart.**
In order to identify each tomcat, as default, SnApp uses the tomcat's mac-address. No need to specify any parameter/setting.\
While this is absolutely fine on phisical installations, it usually **is not enough on dockerized solutions**. In this case you need to leverage on the following parameters.
Fixed code/identifier assigned to the tomcat
By setting this parameter's value to **hostname**, SnApp will use the computer's host name instead of the mac-address.
This parameter is ignored if VGS-ServerCode is specified
